channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ex-Olympic snowboarder accused in drug smuggling ring heads to court
item.description: A former Canadian Olympic snowboarder turned top FBI fugitive made his first appearance in a U.S. court on charges he allegedly ran a billion-dollar m...

item.title: Maine's 'lobster lady' Virginia Oliver, who worked decades in industry, dies at 105
item.description: Virginia Oliver, one of the world's oldest lobster fishers, has died at 105

item.title: Yale to waive all costs for new undergraduates from families earning less than $100,000
item.description: Yale University is eliminating tuition for new undergraduates from families earning less than $100,000 a year

item.title: 3 young brothers in Texas die after falling through icy pond during winter storm
item.description: Authorities say three brothers died in Texas after falling through ice on a pond as a massive winter storm has gripped much of the nation

item.title: Former Virginia Gov. Youngkin pardoned ex-police sergeant in fatal 2023 shooting of unarmed man
item.description: Former Virginia Gov. Glenn Youngkin has pardoned a former police sergeant who shot and killed an unarmed man accused of stealing sunglasses
